snippet.title: Dynasthir - Official Announcement Teaser | PC Steam
snippet.description:
The world is dying. Will you persist?

Delve into the obscure world of Dynasthir, a 3rd person open world Action-RPG where the risk of being undone is ever present.
Featuring a depthful skill-tree progression and rewarding Adrenaline fueled combat, conquer deadly encounters and learn through observation. 
Reactive environmental storytelling allows you to discover a bewitching and perilous world as you traverse it.

Survive the Miasma and push forward - and... you may just live to tell your tale.

Wishlist Dynasthir: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2145210/Dynasthir/
Join the TwinlakeMinstrels Discord: https://discord.gg/cByrxCxW76
